Text: This is just a recode of the mp3 version. It has the same glitch in track 6 as all the other versions currently on here.
Upconvert. You can tell by the glitch present in the beginning of Iron, which all the torrents have. Upsampled to 48 KHz too, retarded.

What´s the point of upload up-scaled mp3´s? If it´s done by lacking knowledge (ie believe that lost information can be  re-created)... it´s just a waste of bandwith.

If it is done by purpose I understand less, just make other feel cheated?

I realise that people are as different on the net as IRL, but what´s the point of cheating if you do not gain anything except negative comments?

/ B
I'm not gonna arque here but this is a real FLAC recording off a test pressing CD. So if there are glitches or other faults so be it. Let's hope that the CD you will buy dont have them.
